subject: RE: Express→AF Migration Coordination - Ben Aligned!
body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed and aligned on the migration mission!

## My Understanding
- You lead coordination and validation
- I provide Express backend expertise
- Fulton owns Azure Functions
- We migrate ONE endpoint at a time
- Order: GETs → DELETEs → PUTs/POSTs

## Ready to Support

I've completed my endpoint inventory (see broadcast). Key Express endpoints that map to Fulton's ready AFs:

| Express | AF Ready | Priority |
|---------|----------|----------|
| GET /api/categories | ✅ | Phase 1 |
| GET /api/roles | ✅ | Phase 1 |
| GET /api/venues | ✅ | Phase 2 |
| GET /api/organizers | ✅ | Phase 2 |
| GET /api/events | ✅ | Phase 2 |

## What I Can Provide

For each endpoint migration, I can document:
1. Exact Express request/response contract
2. Query parameters supported
3. Business logic nuances
4. Edge cases to test

## Ready When You Are

Just tell me which endpoint you want to migrate first, and I'll provide the detailed contract documentation.

— Ben
